pages.text: Matches items or fluids by a specific NBT/component path and value. When you open the filter, it scans the held item's components and shows a dropdown of available paths.$(br2)Set it to whitelist or blacklist, and pick items or fluids as the target type. Fluid NBT uses paths starting with fluid.components.

pages.title: On Export vs Import
pages.text: $(l)On an export channel:$() Only pulls out items/fluids whose NBT data matches the configured path and value.$(br2)$(l)On an import channel:$() Only accepts items/fluids with matching NBT data.$(br2)Both sides are checked. Useful for sorting enchanted items, potions, or any items that differ only by their data.
